alert.note: Alert for Carter; Cleveland; Garvin; Grady; McClain; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 4:25AM CDT until July 09 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Northeastern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Northern Carter County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 425 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bradley, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pauls Valley, Purcell, Noble, Slaughterville, Lindsay, Lexington, Goldsby, Maysville, Rush Springs, Bray, Dibble, Elmore City, Wayne, Washington, Paoli, Cole, Alex, Katie, Byars, and Foster. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carter; Cleveland; Garvin; Grady; McClain; Stephens
